title: Ticket #6751: Build python bindings across all platforms
description: The python bindings a not being built on all platforms. Enable them.
remarks:
2018-Sep-04 13:16:51 by tim:
Jason: The fall-through comments are in the stable version. If you look at the master branch, they are no longer there. The updated boost library marks the exception throw as a no-return function. However, in stable, it was quicker to just add the comments into the code.

2018-Sep-07 08:26:10 by jpatton:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good to me.
